com.taobao.tmts.framework.viewelememt
类 TmtsView

java.lang.Object
  com.taobao.tmts.framework.viewelememt.TmtsView
类型参数：
T - View or its subclass.
所有已实现的接口：
ITmtsView
直接已知子类：
TmtsTextView, TmtsViewGroup
public class TmtsView
extends java.lang.Object
implements ITmtsView

Base class for all view elements in TMTS.

findTmtsViewById

public <T extends TmtsView> T findTmtsViewById(java.lang.String name,
                                               java.lang.Class<T> returnType)
从接口 ITmtsView 复制的描述
Return an instance of TmtsView or its subclass by the given name.

指定者：
接口 ITmtsView 中的 findTmtsViewById
类型参数：
T - TmtsView or its subclass.
参数：
name - String name of view id, the string after @+id/ defined in layout files.
returnType - TmtsView or its subclass.
返回：
TmtsView or its subclass according to the name.

scrollTo

public void scrollTo(int x,
                     int y)
从接口 ITmtsView 复制的描述
Set the scrolled position of your view. This will cause a call to onScrollChanged(int, int, int, int) and the view will be invalidated. This version also clamps the scrolling to the bounds of our child.

指定者：
接口 ITmtsView 中的 scrollTo
参数：
x - the x position to scroll to
y - the y position to scroll to

scrollBy

public void scrollBy(int x,
                     int y)
从接口 ITmtsView 复制的描述
Move the scrolled position of your view. This will cause a call to onScrollChanged(int, int, int, int) and the view will be invalidated.

指定者：
接口 ITmtsView 中的 scrollBy
参数：
x - the amount of pixels to scroll by horizontally
y - the amount of pixels to scroll by vertically

fetchText

public java.lang.String fetchText()
指定者：
接口 ITmtsView 中的 fetchText
